price: What! Is it when we die and become dust [will we return to life]? That is a far-fetched return.”
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
